data.enText: the value of a company's shares; the value of a property after all charges and debts have been paid
shares in a company which do not pay a fixed amount of interest
a situation in which everyone is treated equally
a system of natural justice allowing a fair judgement in a situation which is not covered by the existing laws

simple_means.memory_skill: equi 平等；相等，平均 + ty 表状态 → 公平，公正

example: the judge recognized the fairness of my claim

tr: the ownership interest of shareholders in a corporation
the difference between the market value of a property and the claims held against it

value.def: In finance, your equity is the sum of your assets, for example the value of your house, once your debts have been subtracted from it.

example.ex: To capture his equity, Murphy must either sell or refinance.
example.tran: 要获得资产净值，墨菲必须出售或者重新融资。

value.def: Equity is the quality of being fair and reasonable in a way that gives equal treatment to everyone.

example.ex: We base this call on grounds of social justice and equity.
example.tran: 我们基于社会正义和公平发出这一呼吁。

trans: 资产负值， 负资产 (资产值低于抵押款)

rootsaffixes.indicate: = equal, even 平等；相等, 平均
rootsaffixes.title: equ(i)

partsOfSpeech.dec: equ 平等；相等，平均 + able …的 →〔脾气〕不温不火，比较平均 → 温和的
equ 平等；相等，平均 + al …的 → 相等的，平等的
equal 相等的，平等的 + ity 具备某种性质，状况 → 平等
equ 平等；相等，平均 + anim 生命，精神 + ity 具备某种性质，状况 → 精神平静 → 沉着
equ 平等；相等，平均 + ate 使… → 使平等
equ 平等；相等，平均 + ation 行为，过程，状态，结果 → 相等；方程式
equat〔= equate〕使平等 + or 表状态 → 将〔地球南北〕平分 → 赤道
equi 平等；相等，平均 + libr 自由 + ium → 同样自由 → 平衡
equit〔= equi〕平等；相等，平均 + able 可…的，能…的；具有…性质的 → 公正的；正当的
equi 平等；相等，平均 + ty 表状态 → 公平，公正
equi 平等；相等，平均 + val 价值 + ent 具有…性质的，关于…的 → 相等的；等价的
equi 平等；相等，平均 + voc 声音 + al …的 → 声音难以听清的 → 含糊的
in 不 + iqui〔= equi〕平等；相等，平均 + ty 表状态 → 不平等 → 极不公正；邪恶
